user.title: Add Data Source
user.description: Setup a data source for your target timeframes. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/data_source

data_description.source_id: This must be unique across all sources. This is used in all related entity names.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Data Source
reconfigure.description: Setup a data source for your target timeframes. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/data_source

data_description.source_id: This must be unique across all sources. This is used in all related entity names. Changing will create new entities.

user.title: Add Target Timeframe
user.description: Setup a target time. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/target_timeframe

data.name: The name of your target
data.hours: The hours you require in decimal format.
data.hours_mode: How the defined hours should be interpreted
data.type: The type of target you're after
data.start_time: The minimum time to start the device
data.end_time: The maximum time to stop the device
data.offset: The offset to apply to the scheduled block to be considered active
data.minimum_value: The optional minimum value for target hours
data.maximum_value: The optional maximum value for target hours
data.weighting: The optional weighting to apply to the discovered time period values
data.target_times_evaluation_mode: When should target times be selected

data_description.type: Continuous target will find the continuous period for your target hours with the lowest combined value. Intermittent will find the time periods, with potential gaps, with the lowest combined value which will meet your target hours
data_description.hours: This has to be a multiple of 0.5.

dangerous_settings.name: Dangerous settings
dangerous_settings.description: These settings can have undesired consequences if changed. Change at your own risk.

data_description.minimum_required_minutes_in_slot: The minimum number of minutes that must be present in a slot for it to be considered. Changing this can cause chosen slots to be partially in the past and therefore turn on for less than the desired time.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Target Timeframe
reconfigure.description: Setup a target time. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/target_timeframe

data.name: The name of your target
data.hours: The hours you require in decimal format.
data.hours_mode: How the defined hours should be interpreted
data.type: The type of target you're after
data.start_time: The minimum time to start the device
data.end_time: The maximum time to stop the device
data.offset: The offset to apply to the scheduled block to be considered active
data.minimum_value: The optional minimum value for target hours
data.maximum_value: The optional maximum value for target hours
data.weighting: The optional weighting to apply to the discovered time period values
data.target_times_evaluation_mode: When should target times be selected

data_description.type: Continuous target will find the continuous period for your target hours with the lowest combined value. Intermittent will find the time periods, with potential gaps, with the lowest combined value which will meet your target hours
data_description.hours: This has to be a multiple of 0.5.

dangerous_settings.name: Dangerous settings
dangerous_settings.description: These settings can have undesired consequences if changed. Change at your own risk.

data_description.minimum_required_minutes_in_slot: The minimum number of minutes that must be present in a slot for it to be considered. Changing this can cause chosen slots to be partially in the past and therefore turn on for less than the desired time.

error.value_greater_than_zero: Value must be greater or equal to 1
error.invalid_target_hours: Hours must be in half hour increments (e.g. 0.5 = 30 minutes; 1 = 60 minutes).
error.invalid_target_name: Name must only include lower case alpha characters and underscore (e.g. my_target)
error.invalid_target_time: Must be in the format HH:MM
error.invalid_offset: Offset must be in the form of HH:MM:SS with an optional negative symbol
error.invalid_hours_time_frame: The target hours do not fit in the elected target time frame
error.invalid_value: Value must be in decimal format (e.g. 0.10)
error.invalid_weighting: The weighting format is not supported. Please consult documentation for more information.
error.invalid_weighting_slots: The number of weighting blocks does not equal the specified number of hours.
error.weighting_not_supported_for_type: Weighting is only supported for continuous target values
error.weighting_not_supported_for_hour_mode: Weighting is not supported for this hour mode
error.minimum_or_maximum_value_not_specified: Either minimum and/or maximum value must be specified for minimum hours mode
error.minimum_value_not_less_than_maximum_valu: Minimum value must be less or equal to the maximum value if both are specified
error.invalid_integer: Value must be a number with no decimal places

user.title: Rolling Target Timeframe
user.description: Setup a rolling target time. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/rolling_target_timeframe

data.name: The name of your target
data.hours: The hours you require in decimal format.
data.hours_mode: How the defined hours should be interpreted
data.look_ahead_hours: The number of hours to look ahead when evaluating the available target times
data.offset: The offset to apply to the scheduled block to be considered active
data.minimum_value: The optional minimum value for target hours
data.maximum_value: The optional maximum value for target hours
data.weighting: The optional weighting to apply to the discovered time period values
data.target_times_evaluation_mode: When should target times be selected

dangerous_settings.name: Dangerous settings
dangerous_settings.description: These settings can have undesired consequences if changed. Change at your own risk.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Rolling Target Timeframe
reconfigure.description: Setup a rolling target time. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-TargetTimeframes/setup/rolling_target_timeframe

data.name: The name of your target
data.hours: The hours you require in decimal format.
data.hours_mode: How the defined hours should be interpreted
data.look_ahead_hours: The number of hours to look ahead when evaluating the available target times

data.maximum_value: The optional maximum value for target hours
data.weighting: The optional weighting to apply to the discovered time period values
data.target_times_evaluation_mode: When should target times be selected

invalid_target_timeframe.title: Invalid target timeframe "{name}"
invalid_target_timeframe.description: The target timeframe "{name}" has become invalid. Click on "Learn More" with instructions on what to do next.
